author: mcslee
msg: Summary: Java works, benchmark roundtrip at around 3ms, so right in between C++ and PHP

author: mcslee
msg: Point Thrift bootrapping code to compiler/py instead of compiler

author: mcslee
msg: Thrift test improvements, tests for both inline and normal PHP code gen
Summary: So you can A/B test and see 6ms vs. 4ms response time :)

author: mcslee
msg: Thrift library updates, remove unsigned types

author: mcslee
msg: Thrift compiler improvements, two modes for PHP
Summary: Complete PHP generator and CPP generator to new formats, and offer PHP generator that generates inline code free of any TProtocol abstraction
